name: Better Player
overview: Provides a generic script injection framework to offer highly customizable player enhancements for the Jellyfin Web client. The current version defaults to injecting better_player.js to enhance the Web player interface.
description: The Better Player (Better Web Player Extension) is a Jellyfin plugin based on a generic script injection framework. By injecting the better_player.js script, it aims to deliver an immersive, Bilibili-like experience, comprehensively enhancing keyboard, mouse, and mobile touch controls for highly efficient and intuitive web playback operation.

versions.changelog: Initial release: Implemented the basic injection framework and included better_player.js as the default script.
